subject: Re: All In One Device
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
I have my boxes with AM/FM, and sometimes short wave for audio,. then 
you can even a[pply the seweep technique to TV and get "interesting" 
images, such as the one on the home page here. With TV going HD, I 
haven't spent much time onthe video systems though. 

 I did make a printed circuit board for linear sweep with the audio 
amplifiers, and another board for Ranom sweep. The only problem, the 
stuff remains so time consumming to put together. I'm also having 
trouble coming up with a suitable, and cheap cabinet for the 
electronics, for some tuners, you need a none metalic enclosure. 

 Unfortunate that all attempts at mass productions are seemingly 
blocked.

 An all ways EVP device might be a bit heavy to carry around, but it 
could be done. 

 Frank-S
